short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hover over image links on GitLab to see a preview.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your GitLab experience with our Image Preview extension! This handy tool allows you to effortlessly view images in your GitLab repositories without needing to click through to a separate page. Simply hover over image links to see a quick, high-quality preview right within your workflow. Perfect for developers and teams who want to streamline their review process and save time. Install now and make navigating your GitLab projects smoother and more efficient!
